cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.collection

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.collection.Collectible
      • cscie97.asn4.ecommerce.collection.Collection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicCollection, StaticCollection

    public abstract class Collection
extends Collectible
    Abstract class for Collections. Currently supports two abstract methods for the creation of either StaticCollection or DynamicCollection, and also validating that the required fields for an existing Collection are valid.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Killeffer <rayden7@gmail.com>
    See Also:
    Collection, Collectible, DynamicCollection, StaticCollection

    • Constructor Detail

      • Collection

        public Collection()

    • Method Detail

      • createCollection

        public static Collection createCollection(java.lang.String type)
        Factory method to create an empty "shell" collection, with no properties. Collections can currently only be either StaticCollection or DynamicCollection.
        Parameters:
        type - which type of collection to create; can be either "static" or "dynamic"
        Returns:
        the newly created collection, which will be either StaticCollection, DynamicCollection, or null (if an invalid type was passed)

      • validateCollection

        public static boolean validateCollection(Collection collection)
        Performs a validation check to ensure that the collection contains a minimal set of required attribute properties. Currently only requires that id, name, and description are set.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection to validate
        Returns:
        true if the collection has the minimal set of required properties, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Convenience method to print out the salient properties of the object (useful in debugging).
        Overrides:
        toString in class Collectible
        Returns:
        a string representation of the salient properties of the object
